section.title: Configuring the Monitoring Database Settings
section.bridgehead: Choosing an alarm metrics database option
section.para: The monitoring service supports two different database options. The default metrics database is Vertica, which is a highly-scalable analytics database from HP. Vertica is free to use, up to 12TB, for all paid Helion customers as a Helion operational database . Vertica is the recommended database for .
You can learn more about Vertica here: Vertica Documentation
The alternative open source database option is InfluxDB. InfluxDB is an emerging open source monitoring database, however the current release contains the following limitation:

listitem.para: InfluxDB cluster does not recover upon node failure.
